name: Ubuntu
onCreateCommand: pip3 install ansible-dev-tools; python3 -m pip install 'molecule-plugins[docker]'
postCreateCommand: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y curl apt-transport-https ca-certificates gnupg && echo 'deb [signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/cloud.google.gpg] https://packages.cloud.google.com/apt cloud-sdk main' | sudo tee -a /etc/apt/sources.list.d/google-cloud-sdk.list && curl https://packages.cloud.google.com/apt/doc/apt-key.gpg | sudo apt-key --keyring /usr/share/keyrings/cloud.google.gpg add - && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y google-cloud-sdk
